content.text: Do you have strong communication and stakeholder engagement skills?
Have you got experience of working in a scientific or technical area leading projects?
If so, we are looking for 3 programme leads, and we would love to hear from you!

The three roles are based in the National Security Science and Research (NSSR) for Transport Security Capability and Innovation Lead (2 roles) and Programme Management Office (PMO) Integration Lead (1 role). We plan, deliver and exploit research projects across multiple scientific disciplines to improve the transport sector’s cyber security, land, maritime and aviation security regimes as well as working with international partners to raise global standards and build capability.
For more information, including the full job description and how to apply, please see Civil Service Jobs webpage here.
Apply before 11:55 pm on Friday 3rd November 2023
